title: mRemoteNG does not resize connection screens when disconnecting from HDMI - VERSION 1.76.20.24669
author: austin-bridge
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
I would expect that when disconnecting from HDMI (going from 2 screens to 1 screen) that the connections would auto-resize.

## Current Behavior
When disconnecting from HDMI, the mRemoteNG application appears on the primary screen, however, the connections do not resize appropriately. They still appear the same, large size as if they are still on a larger monitor so I can only access basically the top-left 1/4 of the screen.  Reconnecting does not resize. It seems I have...

iterations.description: Resize RDP connections on monitor connect/disconnect

comments.author: austin-bridge

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
As a workaround you can right-click the tab and choose "reconnect" or Restore Down and up again. This should trigger a resize. 

I believe the issue relies on the fact that having mRemoteNG maximized it does not register when the screen/size is changed and can not trigger the resize/reconnect on demand. But this is just an assumption...
